overview: Duke Brothers Carpet Cleaning has been around for over10 years now, and has focused on providing residents in Chesapeake, Norfolk, Virginia Beach, Portsmouth and Tidewater, Virginia with the highest-quality service in the area. Duke Brothers is a small family owned local business. We value honest and transparent pricing. We train the best technicians in the business, and give professional service at a fair price. We use only the best equipment and supplies and we follow the cleaning standards set by the IICRC. Our Goal is make a great living by giving the best services and products in the Hampton Roads area. We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee or you pay nothing, even if you’re not happy the following day for any reason we will come back and make it right. If you’re still not satisfied we did everything expected of us to give you the best job possible we’ll give you your money back.
